Articles.Content:
Is there a way to change income settings? Those settings you set when you create the game but doing it in the middle of a game.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-10T20:42:27Z" title="05/10/2015 08:42  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 10, 2015</time> by Friend Bear**
You can try opening the settings window at the KSC screen and looking for a difficulty option.

Yeah I tried. Only lets you address issues like respawn and that.

I don't think I can unless its digits in the save game file and I'm alright not to. Oh well thanks though
Yeah, it is 'digits in the save file'. Pretty much the first thing in the persistent.sfs file is the difficulty options. Look for FundsGainMultiplier
